tasks.task: Participating in an agribusiness incubation program
subtasks: Learning practical farming techniques
Attending classes on personal development
Receiving training on financial management
Accessing markets and business skills development
Exploring different farming value chains (e.g., crops, poultry)
Networking with other farmers and stakeholders
Utilizing digital platforms for community engagement
Growing produce using hydroponics and vertical gardens
Implementing business plans with agronomist support
Partnering with local organizations (e.g., TLC Children's Home)
Maintaining nine hectares of farming space
Producing 14,000 crops through hydroponics
Operating an incubation program for five women
Mentoring young women in hydroponics and organic farming
Developing community projects and sharing success stories

tasks.task: Operating an online agricultural platform (I Am Citizen)
subtasks: Creating a community hub for farmers
Offering resources and support through the platform
Collaborating with input suppliers
Sharing success stories and empowering farmers globally
Using vertical gardens for small space agriculture
Training participants in maximizing urban gardening spaces
Promoting zero-waste and food security initiatives
Addressing food shortages through community engagement
Forming the African Women in Agriculture organization
Encouraging female entrepreneurship in farming
Empowering women through skills transfer and support
Recognizing and supporting female farmers on an international stage
Advocating for women's involvement in the agriculture sector
